metadata.name: Allégorie
metadata.description: On the foreground, we can see a face embodying Florian supporting the initial project, in a neo cubism style. Right underneath we can see a man climbing a steep slope (the future of this project), overlooked by a camera (the media keeping Florian under surveillance). The project’s hidden part lies under the yellow line, like the hidden face of the iceberg. It’s a metaphor for all the family and legal problems that we can find in this witchy face. We chose to substitute its eyes for Two NFTs « Visage de couleur ». The waves around Florian embody the psychological torments he has been through. When we look at this piece of art in a global way, we can see that the upper part depicts a strong and radiant future, and the lower part, a dark past that can not affect the project anymore.
